items.sentence: Have both Tom and Mary forgotten to do that?
Have you been standing there the whole time?
Tom doesn\'t need to tell me how to do that.
Tom is concerned about his parents\' health.
Tom is smarter than most people think he is.
Tom is someone who might be able to help us.
You look like you could use a cup of coffee.
I was surprised that Tom refused to do that.
Tom was partly responsible for the accident.
Don\'t walk past me as if we were strangers.
Tom doesn\'t seem to be as happy as Mary is.
Please learn to spell your teachers\' names.
Can you tell me exactly what you want to do?
This building will be demolished next month.
I thought that I might find you two out here
I usually eat lunch in the school cafeteria.
Tom often has trouble choosing what to wear.
I\'ve got a lot of stories I could tell you.
Tom didn\'t know why Mary wasn\'t at school.
Tom didn\'t let me answer Mary\'s questions.
